ORIGAM Documentation : Detail View

Created by Tomáš Vavrda, last modified by Eva Čechurová on Jul 24, 2017

The Properties related to the detail view are in the property group Misc.

GridVisibleIf true, the table view is set as a default view.

HideNavigationPanelIf true, the toolbar panel won't be available.

It is possible to achieve a plain detail view by combining settings of GridVisible (false) and HideNavigationPanel (true).
